addTokenSupport(address).custom:access: Only callable by authorized addresses, typically the contract owner.
addTokenSupport(address).details: Allows the contract owner to add a token address      that can be used for transactions within the Paynest system.

params.tokenAddr: The address of the token contract to be added as supported.

canEmergencyWithdraw(address,address).details: This function checks whether the Paynest owner is allowed to emergency withdraw tokens      from an organization's address in case of an emergency.      Only a token not supported is allowed to be withdrawn.

params.caller: The msg.sender from the Org contract.
params.tokenAddr: The token address to withdraw from

returns._0: True if the caller is the Paynest owner or authorized and token is not in list of supportedTokens, otherwise false.

deployOrganization(string).custom:access: Callable by addresses yet to hit the limit of Orgs to create.
deployOrganization(string).details: Creates a new organization contract instance with the specified name      and links it to the Paynest system for payroll and subscription management.

params.orgName: The name of the organization to be deployed.

getFixedFee().details: The returned value represents the base fee charged for maintaining active subscriptions.      A value of 0 indicates that no fee is required.

returns._0: The fixed subscription fee as an unsigned integer.

params.token: The address of the token contract to be checked.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if token is supported.

redeemSubscriptionFees().custom:access: Only callable by authorized addresses, typically the contract owner.
redeemSubscriptionFees().custom:security: Ensures the caller is authorized and the token is supported.
redeemSubscriptionFees().details: Allows authorized addresses to withdraw fees collected in ETH      from the Paynest system to the contract owner or treasury address.

removeTokenSupport(address).custom:access: Only callable by authorized addresses, typically the contract owner.
removeTokenSupport(address).custom:warning: Ensure all transactions involving this token are settled                 before removing support to avoid disruptions.
removeTokenSupport(address).details: Allows the contract owner to remove a token address      that is no longer supported for transactions within the Paynest system.

params.tokenAddr: The address of the token contract to be removed.

updateFixedFee(uint256).details: The value represents the base fee charged for maintaining active subscriptions.

params.fee: The fixed subscription fee as an unsigned integer.

addTokenSupport(address).notice: Adds support for a new token in the system.

canEmergencyWithdraw(address,address).notice: Checks if the caller is authorized for emergency withdrawal from the organization.

deployOrganization(string).notice: Deploys a new organization within the Paynest system.

getFixedFee().notice: Retrieves the fixed subscription fee for the Paynest system.

isSupportedToken(address).notice: Returns the list of supported tokens.

redeemSubscriptionFees().notice: Claims or redeems accumulated subscription fees.

removeTokenSupport(address).notice: Removes support for a previously added token.

updateFixedFee(uint256).notice: Sets the fixed subscription fee for the Paynest system.
